description:
The following notes are bug fixes that have been implemented in the Nintendo 3DS title "Blaster Master Zero".

â– Ver. 1.4.1
# A bug that would sometimes cause the game to freeze when you would get knocked out as Jason on sideview maps in Boss Blaster Mode has been fixed.
# A number of other small bug fixes and general game improvements have also been implemented.
name:
Blaster Master Zero:
Update
